meanings.sent1: The malacologists carefully examine different types of shells.
meanings.sent2: Many malacologists travel to the beach to collect seashells for research.
meanings.sent3: The malacologists joked that they were 'shell detectives' solving mysteries.
meanings.sent4: In the world of marine biology, malacologists are the treasure hunters of the sea.
meanings.sent5: The passion of malacologists for mollusks is truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: Malacologists: The group of malacologists is meeting next week.
meanings.sent1: Next week, the malacologists will gather to discuss their latest findings.
meanings.sent2: The meeting of malacologists is scheduled for Tuesday afternoon.
meanings.sent3: The malacologists planned a surprise party for their colleague's birthday.
meanings.sent4: The unity among malacologists is as strong as the shells they study.
meanings.sent5: The dedication of the malacologists to their work is truly admirable.

meanings.definition: Malacologists: She is a renowned malacologist in the field.
meanings.sent1: As a renowned malacologist, she has published many papers on mollusks.
meanings.sent2: The field of malacologists recognizes her as a leading expert in the study of shells.
meanings.sent3: Her friends playfully call her the 'queen of malacologists' due to her expertise.
meanings.sent4: In the scientific community, she shines brightly among other malacologists.
meanings.sent5: Her passion for mollusks sets her apart as a remarkable malacologist.
